thread.title: Visual Art: Things get hot at Arvada Center
thread.title_full: Visual Art: Things get hot at Arvada Center

title: Visual Art: Things get hot at Arvada Center
text:
Published By: Denver Post Entertainment - Today 
The Arvada Center's current iron art show gets very real this weekend when the gallery hosts an actual iron pour on the premises....
